name: Bumpercar Beatdown Royale
description:
"HAVE YOU EVER WISHED FOR A BATTLE ROYALE GAME WHERE EVERYONE IS A BUMPERCAR?!"

             "No...?"

"WELL THEN, LET ME INTRODUCE YOU TO THE BEST EXPERIENCE HUMANLY POSSIBLE!!" Controls WASD - Car movement
LSHIFT - Fire rocket
Space - Boost Features
  • 25 PLAYER BATTLE ARENA!!
  • SHRINKING BLUE-ZONE THAT REDUCES THE PLAYFIELD!
  • WACKY ASS PHYSICS!
  • ROCKETS?!
Stretch goals (future stuff I hopefully get to!)
  • 20 player multiplayer
  • Mobile port
Disclaimer

This game concept  was originally created during the first GameDevUnderground JimJam, as sort of an parody on the battle royale genre. Everything was made from scratch except the sound effects and the music: these were all copyright free assets from the Youtube Music & sound-effects library (although I did edit most of them).
